Description.Text: Whether on business or leisure, you will receive South Bay's warmest welcome. Pamper yourself with a treatment at the European day spa or book a sailboat or a whale-watching cruise. Discover South Bay surf and sand. Stroll or bike along miles of beachside trails. Walk to over 15 ocean-view dining spots; take a free shuttle to area shopping malls. (0507/CH)

The hotel overlooks the Pacific Ocean and King Harbor Marina in the beach city of Redondo Beach. It is close to Southern California's attractions and recreational activities, yet only 7 miles (11.3 kms) south of Los Angeles Airport.
Spacious guest rooms are well-appointed and are equipped with modern amenities to make you feel at home.

Casual, affordable dining is available on site. Enjoy California cuisine lightly infused with herbs of the Mediterranean at the bistro which serves sumptuous buffet breakfasts, light or complete lunches, Sunset Dinner value packages each evening, daily specials plus choice steaks, veal, fresh seafood and pasta, pizzas, and more. There is also a convenience court in the lobby for breakfast and light snacks.
Medium-sized lobby with beach elegance offers a comfortable sitting area.
